Name: Hammerground: Splat!
About the game: Hammerground: Splat! is a virtual reality whack-a-mole-like arcade. Grab a pair of hammers; Smash everything that appears in front of you; Collect the crystals to extend the countdown timer. Hammerground: Splat! features quick play and challange modes. This game is designed for Virtual Reality. VR Controllers are required to play Hammerground: Splat!
